==== Notes ====
Unable to get wireless to work with encryption enabled.
Power button does a hibernate in Breezy, and the power button is the only one that will wake it. Power button brings up the Log Out dialog in Dapper.
Browser button launches Firefox by default, email button launches Evolution.
